sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月將從北京大學畢業，我主修的專業是會計學。

sentences.english: Please fax this form to Beijing IHAC project office.
sentences.chinese: 請將此表傳真至北京藝匯家項目辦。

sentences.english: The Beijing South Railway Station sees around fifty thousand passengers departing every day.
sentences.chinese: 北京南站每天有將近5萬客流量。

sentences.english: It took only a short walk on a Beijing street to find other foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京街頭僅走了一小段路來尋找其他的外國人。

sentences.english: Thaksin and his wife, Pojaman, were in Beijing until Sunday for the opening of the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫婦在北京參加奧運開幕式，一直逗留到星期天。

sentences.english: The Passion is a high-end club in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 天上人間是北京一家高端會所。

sentences.english: Choose came to Beijing, began to north bleaching gens.
sentences.chinese: 選擇來到北京，開始北漂一族。

sentences.english: MV, LV Swgr & Distribution Transformers for Phases 1 & 2 and Indoor Lighting of Beijing Shooting Range Hall.
sentences.chinese: 北京射擊館的的配電系統和室內照明的定單。

sentences.english: Development and ecology are two main theme in urban design and construction in Beijing nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 發展與生態是當前北京城市建設的兩大突出主題。

sentences.english: People poured into the Beijing International Sculpture Park.
sentences.chinese: 人們湧進了北京國際雕塑公園。

sentences.english: Destination China is one of the finest Destination Management Companies in China.
sentences.chinese: 北京紫都國旅是中國首屈一指的接待公司。

sentences.english: Chinese elderly exercise at a public park in Beijing. (March 1, 2011) (Vincent Thian/Associated Press)
sentences.chinese: 北京，老年人在公園鍛鍊。

sentences.english: Went to IB-CAS, decided to take the phd exam and try to follow a academician.
sentences.chinese: 去了一次北京植物所，定下來報考一位院士的博士。

sentences.english: The fossil (skull) of "Peking Man" (LPP) discovered in Zhoukoudian, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京猿人頭骨化石在周口店發現。

sentences.english: Of course, Beijing is often also able to exploit these seeming incongruities.
sentences.chinese: 當然，北京也時常能夠從這些不協調的情況中獲益。

sentences.english: But the snag was that the Manchus were outnumbered by Han troops in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 但那時，北京的漢族軍人數量已經超過了滿族軍人。
